title: How to File a Consumer Complaint
problem_summary: If a seller or service provider cheats you or provides defective goods or services, you can file a consumer complaint.

step_by_step_procedure.description: Contact the seller or service provider and try to resolve the issue.
Collect bills, receipts, warranty cards, and communication records.
Register a complaint on the National Consumer Helpline portal.
If unresolved, file a complaint on the e-Daakhil portal.
Track complaint status and attend hearings if required.

time_limits: Within 2 years from the date of cause
tips_and_warnings: File complaint as early as possible
